Instructions

  • Change which shape you're adding using the dropdown button
  • Click on the canvas to add a shape, or click and drag if you have Line or Arrow selected
  • Change colour using the colour picker, toggled using the Pick Colour button
  • Select shapes by holding down your mouse over the shape and then letting go - they will turn yellow once selected
  • Move shapes by dragging them once selected
  • Delete the selected shape using the Delete Shape button
